author: JIM SWIFT
title: Trump Replaces Acting Attorney General
text:
Trump Replaces Acting Attorney General Update: WH says Yates "betrayed" the DOJ. President Donald Trump has relieved Acting Attorney General Sally Yates, who instructed DOJ employees not to defend his executive order on halting entry to the United States from certain countries. 
9:27 PM, Jan 30, 2017 | By Jim Swift Jim Swift Deputy Online Editor The Weekly Standard http://s3.amazonaws.com/assets.weeklystandard.com/authors/swift.png Sorry,   
Photo credit: Kevin Lamarque/REUTERS/Newscom 
President Donald Trump has relieved Acting Attorney General Sally Yates, who instructed DOJ employees not to defend his executive order on halting entry by immigrants to the United States from certain countries. 
Press secretary Sean Spicer announced the move in a tweet : has named Dana Boente, US Attorney for the Eastern District of VA as Acting Attorney General. Sally Yates has been relieved. 
Update: In a statement the White House said that Yates "betrayed the Department of Justice by refusing to enforce a legal order designed to protect the citizens of the United States." Read the statement below: Web Link: http://www.weeklystandard.com/article/2006583
